creator: roberto@spadim.com.br
text:
hi guys, i had a idea about a new MPM (well i don´t know if it´s possible, but..)

php runs fine in pre-fork mode, and others pages can work with faster methods (thread or others) using less memory and cpu use, and a high troughput

well, could we configure apache to use pre-fork if file is a php script (php module) and use other mpm method to 'normal' files?

creator: covener@gmail.com
text: Please use http://httpd.apache.org/userslist.html for discussion, not bugzilla.
